ai.summary: A short, easy 1.2 km diversion off the London Loop in the United Kingdom. This gentle walk is suitable for most ages and provides a quick, scenic detour with a well-maintained path.
ai.terrain_summary: Primarily flat with a mix of paved and compact gravel surfaces. Expect occasional uneven spots or tree roots and gentle grades along the route.
ai.safety_notes: Carry water and wear sturdy footwear. Stay on the marked path and watch for other pedestrians and cyclists. Check the weather and daylight hours; UK conditions can be slippery when wet. If sharing with bikes, give way to faster users and supervise children at all times.
ai.best_seasons: Spring, Summer, and Autumn; walk is most comfortable in mild, dry weather, with wetter conditions in winter.
